thread.section_title: Wesley Chapel Toyota Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wesley Chapel Toyota | www.wesleychapeltoyota.com
thread.title: Brian
thread.title_full: Wesley Chapel Toyota reviewed by Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: I had the best experience with a car dealership in my life (and I used to sell cars). Wesley Chapel Toyota's Johnny Millaway was truly fantastic and from the first email from him, I saw something different than the responses I received from my other 5 local area dealers. I found him to be all about getting a customer what they want, not in the least attempting to simply "sell a car & make a buck". I drove an hour to get to this dealership because of the way they treated me and my family. Johnny had exceptional communication and actually read my emails, unlike the other 5 dealerships I dealt with. I had dealt with 5 other dealerships about this car and those five could have been quintuplets by the way they responded. I told my wife "This fella Johnny Millaway from Wesley Chapel Toyota is way different than all of the other people getting back to me about the car". I have a Toyota dealer 10 minutes from me, but WC Toyota has them beat by far. I know where to go next time and where to send others!
